name: SKI HIT 2017/18
description: Valid in the following ski resorts:\r\nMölltaler glacier lifts ,  mountain Ankogel ,  Matreier Goldried mountain railways ,  Hochpustertaler cable cars ,  mountain railways St. Jakob ,  lifts Kals , Lienz cable cars, Obertilliacher lifts, Kartitscher Liftgesellschaft

itemOffered.areaServed: Mölltaler glacier lifts ,  mountain Ankogel ,  Matreier Goldried mountain railways ,  Hochpustertaler cable cars ,  mountain railways St. Jakob ,  lifts Kals , Lienz cable cars, Obertilliacher lifts, Kartitscher Liftgesellschaft

hoursAvailable.description:
Only in Austria: Family reduction in SkiHit)
0-5 years Children FREE (born: 2012-2018) 
6-18 years 50% discount (born: 1999 - 2011) 
family with more than 2 children (6-18 years): each other child goes free! 
(applies only to multi-day tickets in SkiHit)
Please note: for lost and forgotten ski passes there is unfortunately no substitute !
Schedule and fare changes! Reduction for severely disabled from 60 percent disability;
